subject: Football
lead_paragraph: St. Louis Rams wide receiver Dane Looker will have additional tests designed to rule out an aneurysm after a CT scan that cleared him from a concussion revealed a brain abnormality. Dr. Matt Matava, a team physician, said Looker would also be examined by a neurosurgical consultant. Team medical personnel believe the abnormality is unrelated to the concussion that Looker sustained against the Buffalo Bills on Sept. 28.
